body: So I was playing nebula one day and I was standing on a one block wide sky bridge overlooking the void. Then this guy on my team came and mined the block I was standing on and wee away I went, into the void(there is a special name for doing such a thing that I do not know of). I was wondering if you get a kill point if you do that to someone?
body_tagged: So I was playing nebula one day and I was standing on a one block wide sky bridge overlooking the void. Then this guy on my team came and mined the block I was standing on and wee away I went, into the void(there is a special name for doing such a thing that I do not know of). title: Xtra kill points

replies.body: It's called spleefing, no you shouldn't get points for it.
replies.body_tagged: It's called spleefing, no you shouldn't get points for it.

replies.body: Yeah you shouldn't, but do you?
replies.body_tagged: Yeah you shouldn't, but do you?
